location_details.address: 17786 Garland Groh Blvd, Hagerstown, MD 21740, Hagerstown, MD

tasks_performed.description: Demo all legacy data cabling in the building after parallel network installation; decommission existing networking equipment as required; leave legacy devices as required by local management.
tasks_performed.notes: Scope as explicitly described in first post: 'Legacy Cabling Demo:• CIS Technicians will properly demo all legacy data cabling in the building AFTER they have completed the installation of the parallel network to reduce downtime. This will be done carefully to avoid damaging other trades. Network Buildout:• Upon completion of the demolition of existing data cabling, technicians will decommission existing networking equipment as required. • If required, legacy networking devices will be left will local management.'

network_changes: Decommissioning of existing networking equipment if required
Legacy devices left with local management if required

service_lifecycle.current_stage: Survey/Turnup - Legacy cabling demo and network prep

timeline.description: Turnup assist requested for remote network cutover support; preparatory planning only, no record of execution.
Site Survey scheduled and dispatch confirmed for Hagerstown Centre; no follow-up or execution details provided.
Survey and legacy cabling demolition work scheduled and completed. Existing network equipment decommissioned where required.
Dispatch created for Phase 1 network re-cabling; linked with multiple turnup attempts.
Phase 1 visit failed. Technician (Ritchie) cancelled due to snowstorm, no work performed.
Phase 2 visit cancelled - customer was unaware of scheduled visit; no work was attempted.
Dispatch for outlet install created and scheduled; related turnup failed due to no technician check-in.
Outlet install visit failed; technician (Dahan Electric) did not check in. No work performed.
Phase 1 (second attempt) visit cancelled - customer was unaware of scheduled visit; no work performed.
Phase 2 (second attempt) visit cancelled - customer was unaware of scheduled visit; no work performed.
Project billing milestone created (50% invoice instruction); finance-only, no technical or field event.

tasks_completed: Legacy data cabling demolition completed (2/4/2025, ticket 2380335).
Site survey dispatched (no proof of completion, ticket 2382265).
outstanding_tasks: Phase 2 network re-cabling (both scheduled attempts cancelled).
Any additional configuration or commissioning steps after cabling.
Any post-install validation or hand-off to customer.

issues_summary.issue_description: Technician unable to perform Phase 1 re-cabling due to snowstorm (ticket 2382726).
Phase 2 and later Phase 1/2 attempts cancelled because customer was unaware of visit (tickets 2382746, 2389439, 2389461).
Technician did not check in for scheduled outlet installation (ticket 2385184).
Multiple non-1:1 relationships between dispatch and turnup tickets; evidence of process or scheduling gaps.
issues_summary.resolution: Review ticket chain management and dispatch/turnup linkage process.

consolidated_report.service_status: Project delayed. Only site survey and legacy cabling demo are confirmed. All critical installation and configuration work remains uncompleted due to repeated failures and cancellations.
follow_up_actions: Coordinate with customer for clear notification and mutual schedule for remaining phases.
Reschedule Phase 1 and Phase 2 of network re-cabling with confirmed customer acknowledgment.
Ensure technician check-in compliance for outlet install and future phases.
Review dispatch/turnup workflow for improved 1:1 ticket matching and visibility.
Verify project billing aligns with actual field work delivered.
data_quality_notes: No turnup tickets related to 2376830 (turnup assist) or 2382265 (survey), possible orphaned dispatches.
Phase 1/2, and outlet installation tickets lacked visit/check-in times and customer notification documentation.
No technical or configuration results, equipment, or material details were provided in failed/cancelled visit records.
Billing ticket unrelated to field work completion.
Survey visit completion and result were not documented.
Client feedback and post-visit documentation are entirely missing.
